artist: Artist: Holly Anderson; Artist: Lisa Brooks; Artist: Robert Corbit; Artist: James DeWitt; Artist: Daniel Freeman; Artist: Carol Gaard; Artist: Frank Gaard; Artist: David Johnson; Artist: Joe McDonnell; Artist: William McKearn; Artist: Pat McKearn; Artist: Ed Rath; Artist: John Rath; Artist: Janet Richard; Artist: Jean Ross; Artist: Fred Schulz; Artist: Bob Speed; Artist: Nicholas Sperakis; Artist: Colin Thompson; Artist: Terry Tolman; Artist: Fritz Wolfmeyer; Artist: Chris Woodward; Publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 28 pages, saddle stapled; printed heavy stock covers; red and white publication with large abstract animal/human wearing jumpsuit type outfit and shoes with spikes; small figure at left center holding large bat with letters "AP" and hitting baseball; "Artpolice" written uphill at upper left
provenance: MIA Art Reference and Research Library; transfered to MIA, 2015.
title: Artpolice Comics, Vol. 2, No. 1: "New York Issue"
